alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 2:20PM MDT until March 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches above 7000 feet MSL and 6 to 12 inches below. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bear River Range including but not limited to Emigration Summit. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
